ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Mistmoore and Dark elf camp in Lesser Faydark
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, the other class I haven t played is a magician, mostly due to the incredibly bad experiences I ve had every time I ve been near one. Fortunately those
ygData.messageBody:
Well, the other class I haven't played is a magician, mostly due to
the incredibly bad experiences I've had every time I've been near one.
Fortunately those times have been rare, but inevitably every time I've
joined a group with one, it appears to me as if they are soloing while
only notionally grouping (if that makes sense).

I've been playing less as a bard lately and more as an enchanter since
she's just tons of fun. However, I'm hoping to recover a little faith
in my bard because being a total flirt is what I do best, and no
matter how much I want it, dark elf enchanters just don't seem big
flirts to me! ;-)

--
Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (47)
...expert bard, novice brewer, hardened drinker and terrific flirt

Kalara, Dark Elf Enchanter (18)
...I don't flirt, although sometimes I might be pretending to


On Mon, 17 Jul 2000 14:30:14 -0600, "Kimes, Dean W."
<dean_kimes@...> wrote:

>That's really weird, that's the only class I have not tried as well. What's
>your other one? I am having fun playing my rogue right now since my bard is
>pretty group dependent these days and everyone seems to be super busy this
>summer.
>
> Kit
>
>I do believe that it's a shadowknight quest, but haven't tested it
>yet! ;-) That's one of the two classes I've never tried!
